sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-row>
        <v-col cols="2"><v-btn @click="ADD" :disabled="!isBtnValid"> + </v-btn></v-col>
        <v-col cols="2"><v-btn @click="SUB" :disabled="!isBtnValid"> - </v-btn></v-col>
        <v-col cols="2"><v-btn @click="MULTI" :disabled="!isBtnValid"> × </v-btn></v-col>
        <v-col cols="2"><v-btn @click="DEV" :disabled="!isBtnValid"> ÷ </v-btn></v-col>
    </v-row>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'MethodBtn',
    props:{
        isBtnValid : {
            type: Boolean
        }, Value1 : Number
    },
    watch:{
        isBtnValid() {
            if (this.Value1 === '' || this.Value2 === '') {
                return 0
            }
            return 1
        },
    }
}
</script>
